page.title: 12LIFESTYLES IN GOLLANFIELD
page.content: My dad works for the local oil fabrication yard.He works less hours now that he is on staff and he also gets a car from them.He draws all the plans in stages for the oil rigs. My dad also comes in to why we live here.We live here because he could only get a job up here and not in England.It is different from Yorkshire because in Scotland there is lots of nice countryside and it is so interesting,but in England it is so noisy and cars are coming up and down all the time On Sunday, first we would get up and go to church,then we have a light lunch,then in the afternoon we go for a walk and then we sometimes go for dinner in a restaurant. Our house is a semi-detached bungalow.
